meanings.definition: A bitter alkaloid found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The bebeerine in the plant gives it a bitter taste.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of bebeerine in plants.
meanings.sent3: The bebeerine in the plant made the animals avoid eating it.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a bebeerine effect on his mood.
meanings.sent5: The bebeerine in the plant acted as a natural defense mechanism.

meanings.definition: To treat with or consume bebeerine for medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent1: Doctors may prescribe bebeerine to patients for certain conditions.
meanings.sent2: She decided to bebeerine herself to alleviate her symptoms.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would bebeerine his way to better health.
meanings.sent4: The idea of bebeerining oneself with herbal remedies intrigued her.
meanings.sent5: The old tradition of bebeerining for health benefits is still practiced in some cultures.
